00024 #include "SpectrumListWrapper.hpp"
00025 #include "utility/misc/unit.hpp"
00026 #include "boost/lexical_cast.hpp"
00027 #include "boost/lexical_cast.hpp"
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 
00030 
00031 using namespace pwiz::analysis;
00032 using namespace pwiz::msdata;
00033 using namespace pwiz::util;
00034 using namespace std;
00035 using boost::lexical_cast;
00036 using boost::shared_ptr;
00037 
00038 
00039 class MyWrapper : public SpectrumListWrapper
00040 {
00041     public:
00042 
00043     MyWrapper(const SpectrumListPtr& inner)
00044     :   SpectrumListWrapper(inner)
00045     {}
00046 
00047     void verifySize(size_t size)
00048     {
00049         // verify that we can see inner_ 
00050         unit_assert(size == inner_->size());
00051     }
00052 };
00053 
00054 
00055 void test()
00056 {
00057     SpectrumListSimplePtr simple(new SpectrumListSimple);
00058 
00059     const size_t spectrumCount = 10;
00060     for (size_t i=0; i<spectrumCount; i++)
00061     {
00062         simple->spectra.push_back(SpectrumPtr(new Spectrum));
00063         Spectrum& s = *simple->spectra.back();
00064         s.index = i;
00065         s.id = "S" + lexical_cast<string>(i);
00066         s.nativeID = lexical_cast<string>(i);
00067     }
00068 
00069     shared_ptr<MyWrapper> wrapper(new MyWrapper(simple)); 
00070 
00071     // make sure we're getting what we expect
00072 
00073     wrapper->verifySize(10);
00074     unit_assert(wrapper->size() == 10);
00075     for (size_t i=0; i<spectrumCount; i++)
00076     {
00077         string id = "S" + lexical_cast<string>(i);
00078         string nativeID = lexical_cast<string>(i);
00079 
00080         unit_assert(wrapper->find(id) == i);
00081         unit_assert(wrapper->findNative(nativeID) == i);
00082 
00083         const SpectrumIdentity& identity = wrapper->spectrumIdentity(i);
00084         unit_assert(identity.id == id);
00085         unit_assert(identity.nativeID == nativeID);
00086 
00087         SpectrumPtr s = wrapper->spectrum(i);
00088         unit_assert(s->id == id);
00089         unit_assert(s->nativeID == nativeID);
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 int main()
00095 {
00096     try
00097     {
00098         test();
00099         return 0;
00100     }
00101     catch (exception& e)
00102     {
00103         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00104         return 1;
00105     }
00106     catch (...)
00107     {
00108         cerr << "Caught unknown exception.\n";
00109         return 1;
00110     }
00111 }
